title: MacMillan Get Ready for International English (A2) Level 1
description:
MacMillan Get Ready for International English (A2) Level 1 - English for the workplace
Author: Dorothy Zemach and Andrew Vaughan
ISBN: 9780230433250
Format: Paperback
Pages: 144
Published Date: 17 May 2013
Publisher: Macmillan Education

Student Book 1 with Class Audio CDs (x2)
Teachers Book 1 with Teachers Digibook (CD)

An international English course to prepare students for working life.
Get Ready for International Business aims to do just that: Prepare students at pre-service or early-work level with communicative transactional English for an office environment. It provides functional international English for the workplace with a strong focus on listening and speaking.
There is a strong link with business-related English exams with TOEIC or BEC-style tasks and practice throughout the course. 

This is a compact and easily achievable course with roughly 60 hours of material for each level. With extra practice for the TOEIC exam. <a href="
http://www.macmillanenglish.com/courses/get-ready-for-international-business/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.macmillanenglish.com/courses/get-ready-for-international-business/</a>
